title: Riot - Skin Sales not showing up
body:
Dear Riot,
The new skin sales (3/April/2015 to 6/April/2015) are not showing up on the store. 
I have been constantly checking the Client for more than half a day already.

Regards,
flamingsword2

replies.body:
I've seen this too. Strange.

Post this in Misc. and see if a red stumbles across it.
